duties_responsibilities.duty: Conduct sterilization validation and maintain compliance with regulatory standards for medical devices.
Utilize OECD, FDA GLP, GMP, ISO 10993 series, ISO 17025, USP Pharmacopeia standards in sterilization processes.
Contribute to the implementation of the European Medical Device Regulation to ensure adherence to relevant guidelines.

education_certification.credential: Master’s degree in Microbiology, Biotechnology, Science, or Pharmacy with relevant experience in sterilization validation or equivalent
